N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6021.4 - Requirements for approval of a course in police supervision

State Regulations
(a) No later than
45 days prior to commencement of a supervisory course, the course director
shall file a copy of the proposed curriculum with the commissioner. This copy
shall be in a form approved or prescribed by the commissioner and shall
include: (1)
course location and
sponsor; (2)
a chronological
listing of topics; including the date, time and number of hours allotted to
each topic; (3)
the names of
instructors and the type of instructor certification held by each instructor; and
(4)

The name of the course
director as defined in section
6021.1
(b) of this

Part. (b) The
commissioner may require any additional information deemed necessary for the
purposes of approving a curriculum. (c) The commissioner shall make an individual
written certification for each supervisory course conducted when in his or her
judgment the information furnished warrants such action. Notes
